title: bring back old leblanc please. (RANT)
body: please please please riot PLEASE bring back the old leblanc. im sick of losing games that i should be winning when i play lb. i hate the passive and i hate her new rework i HATE everything. there was no reason to rework leblanc she was perfect! PLEASE BRING BACK OLD LEBLANC OH MY GOD!

replies.body: Riot doesn't revert reworks, don't ask such nonsense
Didn't they do that to Kog maw tho? I mean, it was because he was broken but they do revert reworks?
Yeah they did in that case because his new mechanic was supremely unhealthy/unbalanceable

There are lots of guide online that teach you how to play rework LB. Videos on youtube is the best visual method. 

She is still very strong, you just need to** play** her **correctly**.

to lb mains the new lb is brutal to play shes so clunky and not any fun. i use to be able to play lb every game and have fun doing it now with the new lb i get so bored shes un-mechanical now. it makes my heart bleed. So sad.

Pefect in your eyes, but broken in ours.

You see, LB and other assassins had very little counterplay back then (apparently). The rework added some counterplay to them. IMO, lb is still broken and OP but you know, reworks happen no matter what mate

i just hate the fact i have to wait 1.5 seconds for the bonus damage to take effect. now 1.5 seconds may be less to others but for an assassin every second is alot. in 1.5 seconds alot can happen. such as gank, escape, counter, etc.
